name: I Dice Big Putts
description:
"I Dice Big Putts" is a hybrid Dice and Golf game.

Take your full set of clubs and try your hardest on 9 great courses to try and get under par. You've got control of power and angle, but the wind is working against you.

You roll the dice and try to make a hand containing 3/4/5 of a kind, or a run (small/large straight) to power your next shot.

Good Luck!
